2.caption_en:
MindSphere layered architecture diagram showing applications (Siemens, partners, industry starters) on top of common application components, an application framework, core components, and a connectivity layer linking to devices, agents and edge apps. The diagram highlights modules like Asset Management, Predictive Maintenance, Data Modeling, KPI & Dashboards, and various connectivity icons.
